Name: Hidden Blade
Desc:
Summons a dagger that exists in the Secret Flower Garden's Book Ghost to add powerful bonus damage to all your attacks. Also, increases DAMAGE.
Lock Activation Effect: Right-click

H.Old:
MP Cost: 200. Damage +10%.
[Final Attack Skills] A 100% chance of adding 240% additional hits to direct attacks for 90 sec.
H.New:
MP Cost: 200. Damage +10%.
[Final Attack Type Skill] Direct Attack skill hits create a 100% chance of an additional attack at 240% Damage for 90 sec.
